details.Description: Testing and detection methods for COVID-19

Methods.Name: CRISPR-Cas Based Detection
Methods.Description: A quicker and simpler method for detecting SARS-CoV-2

Methods.Name: Rapid Detection Kit
Methods.Description: A second type kit that can immobilize monoclonal antibodies and specifically detect the particular antigen of SARS-CoV-2 virus

name: BARCOPES Exams
date_of_notification: Jan. 2, 2025* Launch of Online Application Portal
end_date: Feb. 5, 2025* Last Date for Online Application

Eligibility.Age Limit: 28 yrs. as on Aug. 1, 2025 and hence should have been born on or after Aug. 1, 1997 for general category.
Eligibility.Qualifying Degree: Candidates must be Indian citizen and have minimum 60% Marks (or minimum of 6.0 CGPA on the scale of 10.0 or equivalent) as per the ordinances of the respective university in M.E./M.Tech. / Equivalent Degree as well as B.E./B.Tech.
